ingredients.ingredient: 1 tablespoon Creole seasoning, or to taste

cookingTips: Pat fish dry before seasoning and cooking to ensure good browning and prevent steaming
Heat oil over medium-high heat; cook fish 4-5 minutes per side depending on thickness until opaque
Warm Alfredo sauce separately and infuse with garlic-butter just before plating to maintain quality
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This dish combines mild tilapia with bold Creole seasoning and creamy Alfredo sauce. How do these contrasting flavor profiles balance on the plate?
